Enable (if effectFocusButton pressed: Focus) Effect 1 of Effect Unit 1, Button: FX1-1 ON
Enable (if effectFocusButton pressed: Focus) Effect 1 of Effect Unit 2, Button: FX2-1 ON
Enable (if effectFocusButton pressed: Focus) Effect 2 of Effect Unit 1, Button: FX1-2 ON
Enable (if effectFocusButton pressed: Focus) Effect 2 of Effect Unit 2, Button: FX2-2 ON
Enable (if effectFocusButton pressed: Focus) Effect 3 of Effect Unit 1, Button: FX1-3 ON
Enable (if effectFocusButton pressed: Focus) Effect 3 of Effect Unit 2, Button: FX2-3 ON
Press hold: Enables effect focus selection, Shortpress: Toggles effect focus mode of EffectUnit 1, Button: FX1 TAP
Press hold: Enables effect focus selection, Shortpress: Toggles effect focus mode of EffectUnit 2, Button: FX2 TAP
Effect Unit 1 assign Channel 1 Button: FX1 assign 1
Effect Unit 2 assignment channel 1, Button: FX2 assign Button 1
Effect Unit 1 assign Channel 2 Button: FX1 assign 2
Effect Unit 2 assignment channel 2, Button: FX2 assign Button 2
Effect Unit 1 assignment Channel 4, Button: FX1 assign SHIFT 2
Effect Unit 2 assignment channel 4, Button: Shift & FX2 assign Button 2
Switch between EffectUnits, Button: SHIFT & FX1 TAP
Switch between EffectUnits, Button: SHIFT & FX2 TAP
Effect Unit 1 assign Channel 3, Button: FX1 assign SHIFT 1
Effect Unit 2 assignment channel 3, Button: Shift & FX2 assign Button 1
